titleStmt.title: The pathway to saving knowledge, or, A description of true wisdom seting [sic] forth the great worth and incomparable excellency thereof : with directions how a man may attain to the same, and of foolish and ignorant, become wise and prudent, even wise to salvation.
titleStmt.author: Killiray, Matthew.

titleStmt.title: The pathway to saving knowledge, or, A description of true wisdom seting [sic] forth the great worth and incomparable excellency thereof : with directions how a man may attain to the same, and of foolish and ignorant, become wise and prudent, even wise to salvation.
titleStmt.author: Killiray, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
